reviews.review_content:
Barton is really nice. EASY CLASS. Real easy. For all ChemEs, this will be the easiest class EVER.
Workload:
Homework (where if you put anything down you get a perfect score) 1 Midterm

Very approachable, kept material interesting (although a couple of the guest speakers were a bit dull). Looking forward to having him for future courses. I highly recommend the course to all ChemEs, as well as to any other engineers who are looking for a good pre-professional course, and aren't scared of a little chemistry.
Workload:
Occasional problem sets, which weren't terribly difficult. A midterm in similar style. No final exam, but a small final group project, which didn't require too much work. Workload overall light. [Reviewer A]
